message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, let's move on!
I'll take a smaller share, but I think I deserve more than 30. Your turn again, Bob!
You're getting desperate, take what you can get!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it, Bob!
You're running out of time, take the scraps!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
You're almost out of time, don't expect a better deal!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to settle for scraps.
You're really running out of time, don't expect a better deal!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to settle for almost nothing.
This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
